title: Allergic to COVID-19 vaccine? What to know about the ingredients
description: WENY News is digging deeper into the ingredients in the COVID-19 vaccine. Last week, WENY News spoke to a local woman from Tompkins County who says she was denied the COVID-19 vaccine due to food ...
